Verify that media queries are reported properly.
mediaRule #0
    text: (10px < width < 1000px)
    source: mediaRule
    range: {"endColumn":30,"endLine":13,"startColumn":7,"startLine":13}
    computedText: (10px < width < 1000px)
    mediaQuery #0
        mediaExpression #0
            feature: width
            value: 1000
            unit: px
            computed length: 1000
mediaRule #1
    text: (max-width: 0px), (min-width: 1000em)
    source: mediaRule
    range: {"endColumn":52,"endLine":12,"startColumn":7,"startLine":12}
    computedText: all and (max-width: 0px), (min-width: 1000em)
    mediaQuery #0 active: false
        mediaExpression #0
            feature: max-width
            value: 0
            unit: px
    mediaQuery #1 active: false
        mediaExpression #0
            feature: min-width
            value: 1000
            unit: em
            computed length: 16000
mediaRule #2
    text: (max-width: 100px), (max-width: 72em)
    source: mediaRule
    range: {"endColumn":65,"endLine":21,"startColumn":7,"startLine":21}
    computedText: (max-width: 100px), (max-width: /* comment inside */ 72em)
    mediaQuery #0
        mediaExpression #0
            feature: max-width
            value: 100
            unit: px
            computed length: 100
    mediaQuery #1
        mediaExpression #0
            feature: max-width
            value: 72
            unit: em
            computed length: 1152

mediaRule #18
    text: screen and (min-width: 10px) and (max-height: 4000px)
    source: importRule
    range: {"endColumn":42,"endLine":1,"startColumn":37,"startLine":0}
    computedText: screen and\n(min-width: 10px) and (max-height: 4000px)
    mediaQuery #0
        mediaExpression #0
            feature: min-width
            value: 10
            unit: px
            computed length: 10
        mediaExpression #1
            feature: max-height
            value: 4000
            unit: px
            computed length: 4000
